title: Gr8 Agent – Financial Analytics Assistant
description: An intelligent financial analytics platform that combines AI-powered insights with real-time market data. FinBot provides personalized financial advice, portfolio analysis, and predictive market trends through natural language conversations. The system leverages machine learning algorithms to offer investment recommendations, risk assessment, and automated financial reporting for both individual investors and institutional clients.

screenshots.title: AI Chat Interface
screenshots.description: Natural language financial assistant with real-time market insights and portfolio analysis.

screenshots.title: Portfolio Dashboard
screenshots.description: Comprehensive investment portfolio visualization with performance metrics and risk analysis.

screenshots.title: Market Analytics
screenshots.description: Real-time market data visualization with predictive trend analysis and investment opportunities.

title: ConstructEase – Construction Management Suite
description: a comprehensive construction project management platform that digitizes and streamlines the entire construction lifecycle from planning to invoicing. The platform connects all stakeholders—architects, foremen, supervisors, contractors, and clients—through a unified real-time system that prevents costly rework, reduces material waste, and ensures project profitability.

screenshots.title: Project Dashboard
screenshots.description: Tracks live project progress and visualizes materials usage through interactive charts.

screenshots.title: Task Management
screenshots.description: Collaborative task board for engineers, supervisors, and contractors.

screenshots.title: Task Management
screenshots.description: Collaborative task board for engineers, supervisors, and contractors.

title: InsightFlow – Data Science & Research Platform
description: A Computational Market Microstructure Analysis (CMMA) is the science of applying Algorithmic Trading Concepts specifically data processing, statistical computation, and visualization—to quantify and analyze the internal dynamics of financial markets. It moves beyond simple price prediction to understand the behavior of the market through metrics derived from raw, high-frequency or daily market data (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume).

screenshots.title: Data Dashboard
screenshots.description: Displays machine learning predictions and performance insights in real time.

screenshots.title: ETL Workflow
screenshots.description: Automated ETL and model deployment pipeline for experimental datasets.
